Get ready for a new week (Picture: Getty / metro.co.uk)
This week, Jupiter goes into retrograde on (from July 28 until November 23). 
A retrograde is when a planet looks, from our vantage point on … [+9032 chars]

articles.author: Astha Saxena
articles.title: Prince George snapped looking 'same height' as 'Gan gan' sends royal fans into frenzy - Express
articles.description: ROYAL FANS were left surprised after the Queen shared a picture of her great-grandson Prince George and the pair were the same height.
